Control.Text: Due to major changes between the current version and previous versions, your list of events will have to be wiped. I apologize for the inconvenience, but starting from a clean slate will reduce the likelihood of errors. Please click "Accept" and your UI will reload.
Control.Name: MajorVersionWarning
